弝字的基本解释

弝
bà
弓背中部手握着的地方：“玉弝角弓珠勒马。”
古同“把”（b?），器物上的柄。

弝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bà］
［《廣韻》必駕切，去禡，幫。］
(1)弓背中央手执处。
(2)谓握住弓背中央。
(3)把柄。

弝字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【弓字部】　弝； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页357第14
【廣韻】【韻會】【正韻】?必駕切，音霸。【玉篇】弓弛也。【韻會】弛弣中手執處也。

弝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
弝字的起名意思

暂无。

弝
Basic explanation of words
弝
bà
The place where the hands are held in the middle of the arch back: "Yubijiao bow and Zhuzhu lema."
Ancient Tong "handle" (b?), the handle on the utensil.
弝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bà］
["Guangyun" must be cut, go to the 禡, help. ]
(1) The central hand holding the arched back.
(2) Said to hold the center of the arch.
(3) Handle.
弝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Jixia] [Bow Character Department] 　弝; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 357 14
[Guang Yun] [Rhyme Club] [Positive Rhyme]? Must drive and cut, Yinba. [Jade articles] Bow relaxation also. [Rhyme Club] You can also hold hands in the relaxation.
弝
